item.description:
How about we join up and fly into North Central for a FAA Safety seminar with Our Favorite Controller, Bob A?

It's a little earlier than a usual fly out for a Saturday morning. I would think we should leave no later than 7:30 if we want to have breakfast there or somewhere enroute. (Southbridge, Willlimantic?)

Seminar starts at 9:30. a short hop. Only 40 nm. But we can go for lunch afterwards too if we want :-)

http://www.navmonster...

http://www.airnav.com...

This event is sponsored by New England Aviaiton, Inc and John H Sulyma Insurance Agency.
I found the flyer for this at BID.

Get a good nights rest and we'll head out before the traffic for a couple stops, food and a seminar!

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: A Morning with ATC Bob Adelizzi at North Central
